channel.title: CVE Feed for OSIsoft -- PI Coresight
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OSIsoft -- PI Coresight

item.title: CVE-2017-9641|2024-08-05T17:11:02.371Z -- osisoft -- pi%20coresight
item.description: PI Coresight 2016 R2 contains a cross-site request forgery vulnerability that may allow access to the PI system. OSIsoft recommends that users upgrade to PI Vision 2017 or greater to mitigate this vulnerability.
